trans-unit.source: Contains a serialized version of the original token that was used at sign-in time.
trans-unit.target: 包含在登录时使用的原始令牌的序列化的版本。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext"></xref> class by using the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext"></xref>类通过使用指定的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array that represents the token.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，表示令牌。

trans-unit.source: token is .
trans-unit.target: tokenis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext"></xref> class by using the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext"></xref>类通过使用指定的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the token.
trans-unit.target: 表示令牌的字符串。

trans-unit.source: token is .
trans-unit.target: tokenis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext"></xref> class by using the specified security token and token handler.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext"></xref>通过使用指定的安全令牌和令牌处理程序类。

trans-unit.source: The token handler is not used to deserialize the token because it cannot be assumed to exist at the time when the token is deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 令牌处理程序不用于反序列化令牌，因为它不能假定反令牌序列化时存在。

trans-unit.source: The security token to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The handler with which to serialize the token.
trans-unit.target: 用于序列化令牌处理程序。

trans-unit.source: token is .
trans-unit.target: tokenis .

trans-unit.source: -or- tokenHandler is .
trans-unit.target: -or- tokenHandler is .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext"></xref> class from a stream.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext"></xref>从流的类。

trans-unit.source: The serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 序列化的数据。

trans-unit.source: The context for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 序列化的上下文。

trans-unit.source: info is **null**.
trans-unit.target: infois **null**.

trans-unit.source: Populates the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with data needed to serialize the current <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 填充<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>所需数据来序列化当前<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: 要填充数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: 此序列化的目标。

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Gets the security token that was used to initialize the context.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于初始化上下文的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: This property is only set if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor was used; otherwise it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅设置此属性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler%29?displayProperty=fullName>使用构造函数; 否则它是`null`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The security token or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 安全令牌或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the token handler that was used to initialize the context.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于初始化上下文的令牌处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This property is only set if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor was used; otherwise it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅设置此属性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler%29?displayProperty=fullName>使用构造函数; 否则它是`null`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The token handler or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 令牌处理程序或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that was used to initialize the context.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于初始化上下文的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This property is only set if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor was used; otherwise it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅设置此属性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>使用构造函数; 否则它是`null`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The string that was used to initialize the context or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用于初始化上下文的字符串或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the array that was used to initialize the context.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于初始化上下文的数组。

trans-unit.source: This property is only set if the [BootstrapContext.BootstrapContext(Byte\[\])](assetId:///M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.#ctor(System.Byte[])?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=False) constructor was used; otherwise it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅设置此属性[BootstrapContext.BootstrapContext (字节\[\])](assetId:///M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.#ctor(System.Byte[])?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=False)使用构造函数; 否则它是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The array that was used to initialize the context or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用于初始化上下文的数组或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
